Photo by Potteraddict on February 21, 2021. May be an image of 1 person and text that says '#344 MYPOTTERFACTS Neville's family persistently missed faint signs of magic in him. Moments after birth, even the midwife who attended Alice Longbottom had failed to notice that Neville managed to shift his blankets more snugly over himself. Not until he was 8 yearsold, when he survived a fall that should have killed him, did his disappointed aunts and uncles accept that he was truly a wizard.'.
